iti17:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti17:2.1: “Taking into account exterior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very helpful as good friendship for a trainee mendicant who hasn’t achieved their heart’s desire, but lives aspiring to the supreme sanctuary.
iti17:2.2: A mendicant who has good friends gives up the unskillful and develops the skillful.”
iti17:2.3: That is what the Buddha said.
iti17:4.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
